あっ.english_translation: Oh! Ah! (interjection expressing sudden surprise or realization)
あっ.russian_translation: Ах! О! (выражение внезапного удивления или ошибки)

あと.russian_translation: остаток, то, что осталось; потом, после

あるいは.english_translation: or (used to present alternatives); maybe, perhaps

あんまり.english_translation: not very (much), scarcely; too much (often with a negative connotation)

いけない.english_translation: must not, should not; bad, wrong, unacceptable (often implies a rule or consequence)

いずれ.english_translation: in due course, sooner or later; eventually
いずれ.russian_translation: в конце концов, рано или поздно

いただきます.english_translation: I humbly receive (a phrase said before eating to express gratitude)

いつか.english_translation: someday, sometime (in the future or past)

いらっしゃい.english_translation: welcome (used to greet a guest or customer)

うなる.english_translation: to groan, moan; to growl, roar

おまえ.english_translation: you (informal, familiar, or sometimes rude, typically male speech)

おや.english_translation: Oh! Dear me! (interjection expressing slight surprise or discovery)

お目に掛かる.english_translation: to meet (humble form, literally 'to hang before eyes')

きつい.russian_translation: тесный, тугой; суровый, тяжелый; резкий (о звуке, запахе)

これら.english_translation: these (plural, referring to things near the speaker)

さっぱり.english_translation: refreshed, light; completely (e.g., forgotten); neat, plain
さっぱり.russian_translation: легкий, свежий (об ощущении, вкусе); совершенно, начисто (с отрицанием)

さて.english_translation: well, now, then (used to change the subject or resume speaking)
さて.russian_translation: итак, ну, а теперь (для перехода к новой теме)

しかも.russian_translation: более того, к тому же, при этом

したがって.russian_translation: следовательно, в связи с этим, поэтому

しまう.english_translation: to put away, put back; (as a suffix) to finish completely, to do something unintentionally or regrettably
しまう.russian_translation: убрать, закончить; (суффикс) доделать, нечаянно сделать (с сожалением)

しまった.english_translation: Oh no! Darn it! (expressing regret or realization of a mistake)
しまった.russian_translation: Ах, вот оно что! Черт возьми! (выражение сожаления, досады)

すなわち.english_translation: that is (to say), in other words

すみません.english_translation: Excuse me, I'm sorry; Thank you

ずっと.english_translation: continuously, all the time; far (more or less than another thing)

そこで.english_translation: therefore, so; thereupon (used to introduce a next step or conclusion)
そこで.russian_translation: поэтому, в связи с этим; тут, тогда

そっくり.english_translation: exactly alike, just like; all, whole

そのまま.english_translation: as it is, without changing; immediately

それでも.russian_translation: тем не менее, несмотря на это

それと.english_translation: and also, besides (used to add another point)

それとも.english_translation: or (used to ask for a choice between alternatives)

たとえ.english_translation: even if, even though, no matter how

たまらない.english_translation: unbearable, irresistible; can't help but (do something)

だって.russian_translation: потому что (в ответ на вопрос); даже (в разговорной речи)

ちょうだい.english_translation: Please give me; Please do (a favor) (casual, often used by women or children)

つまり.english_translation: in short, that is to say; in the end
つまり.russian_translation: то есть, другими словами; в итоге

で.english_translation: at, in (location of action); by means of; with; (as a conjunction) so, then
で.russian_translation: в, на (место действия); с помощью; (союз) и, тогда

ところが.english_translation: however, nevertheless; on the contrary; even so
ところが.russian_translation: однако, тем не менее; а тут

ところで.english_translation: by the way (used to change the topic)

とにかく.english_translation: anyway, in any case; at any rate
とにかく.russian_translation: во всяком случае, так или иначе; в любом случае

どうか.english_translation: please (strong request); somehow, by all means

どうしても.english_translation: by all means, absolutely; cannot help (doing something)
どうしても.russian_translation: во что бы то ни стало, обязательно; никак (не могу)

どんな.english_translation: what kind of, what sort of

どんなに.russian_translation: как бы ни, насколько бы ни

なお.english_translation: furthermore, still, yet; besides (used to add an additional remark)
なお.russian_translation: кроме того, все еще; (в письме) p.s.

なかなか.english_translation: very, quite (in a good sense); not easily (with a negative verb)

なぜなら.russian_translation: потому что, причина в том, что

なにも.english_translation: nothing (at all); no need to (with a negative verb)

ね.english_translation: right? isn't it? (seeking agreement or confirmation)

ばったり.english_translation: with a clatter (falling); unexpectedly, suddenly (meeting someone)

まあ.english_translation: well, oh (expresses slight surprise or softening); moderately

まさか.english_translation: by no means, impossible; surely not!
まさか.russian_translation: неужели? невозможно; ни в коем случае

まるで.english_translation: as if, as though; completely (with a negative verb)
まるで.russian_translation: словно, точно так же, как; совершенно (с отрицанием)

もしも.english_translation: if, in case (stronger than もし)

よろしく.english_translation: regards, best wishes; please remember me; nice to meet you; please take care of this
よろしく.russian_translation: прошу любить и жаловать; наилучшие пожелания; позаботьтесь об этом

アウト.english_translation: out (as in baseball); error, mistake (from English 'out')

一体.english_translation: one body, one unit; (used in questions to express wonder or emphasis) what on earth?, why in the world?
一体.russian_translation: единое целое; (в вопросах) собственно, вообще, что это такое?

一層.english_translation: much more, still more; (in architecture) one layer, one floor
一層.russian_translation: еще больше, тем более; один слой, один этаж

一方.english_translation: one side, one party; on the one hand; meanwhile
一方.russian_translation: одна сторона; с одной стороны; между тем

一時.english_translation: for a while, temporarily; one o'clock

一種.english_translation: a kind, a species, a variety

一言.english_translation: a single word, a brief comment

万一.english_translation: by any chance, just in case (e.g., of an emergency)

下さる.english_translation: to give (respectful form to the speaker or their in-group)

下す.english_translation: to lower, let down; to issue (an order); to make (a judgment)

下ろす.english_translation: to lower (something); to withdraw (money from a bank)

不.english_translation: non-, un-, in-, absence of (prefix indicating negation)

与える.english_translation: to give, bestow, grant (often formal or abstractly, e.g., to give an impression)

両替.english_translation: money exchange (of currency or large notes for smaller ones)

中古.english_translation: used, second-hand; medieval period (in Chinese history)

乗せる.english_translation: to place (on something); to give a ride (to someone)

人生.english_translation: human life (the entire course of a life)

今に.english_translation: before long, soon; eventually (often implies a negative outcome)

今にも.english_translation: at any moment, just about to (do something)
今にも.russian_translation: вот-вот, сейчас же, в любой момент

今回.english_translation: this time, now, on this occasion

今後.english_translation: from now on, in the future

付ける.english_translation: to attach, fasten; to follow; to note down

任せる.english_translation: to entrust (a task) to another; to leave (something) to someone else

会計.english_translation: accounting, finance; bill, check (at a restaurant)

伸ばす.english_translation: to stretch, extend; to postpone; to develop (skill)

伸びる.english_translation: to stretch, extend; to grow; to improve

伺う.english_translation: to visit; to ask, inquire (humble form)

似合う.english_translation: to suit, match, look good (on someone)

位.english_translation: rank, position; degree; place (in a competition)

何とか.english_translation: somehow, anyhow; one way or another
何とか.russian_translation: кое-как, как-нибудь; во что бы то ни стало

余り.english_translation: remainder, rest; not very (with negative verb)

余裕.english_translation: leeway, room, reserve (e.g., of time or money); composure

便.english_translation: convenience, facilities; letter, message; flight, trip

係.english_translation: person in charge, attendant; connection, duty

倒す.english_translation: to knock down, throw down, defeat

偶.english_translation: by chance, unexpectedly (used in compound words)

備える.english_translation: to prepare for, provide for; to equip

優れる.english_translation: to surpass, excel, be superior to

元.english_translation: origin, root; former, ex-; Yuan (Chinese currency)

先ず.english_translation: first of all, in the first place

全く.english_translation: completely, totally; (with negative) not at all

全然.english_translation: completely, utterly; (with negative) not at all, never

再び.english_translation: again, a second time, once more

分ける.english_translation: to divide, separate; to distribute, share

切れ.english_translation: piece, slice; sharpness; end (of a period)

切れる.english_translation: to cut well, be sharp; to break, snap; to expire
切れる.russian_translation: резать, быть острым; порваться; истечь (о сроке)

刈る.english_translation: to cut (hair, grass, crops), to harvest

列車.english_translation: train (specifically a train on a railway)

別に.english_translation: separately, apart; particularly, not especially (with negative)
別に.russian_translation: отдельно; (с отрицанием) не особенно, ничего страшного

前者.english_translation: the former (the first of two mentioned)

割る.english_translation: to divide, cut up, break; to dilute

加える.english_translation: to add, include, increase; to inflict (damage)

加わる.english_translation: to join, participate; to be added to

劣る.english_translation: to be inferior to, be worse than

効く.english_translation: to be effective, to work (e.g., medicine, effect)

占める.english_translation: to occupy, account for, hold (a position)

去る.english_translation: to leave, depart; to pass (of time)

及ぼす.english_translation: to exert, exercise, cause (an effect or influence)

友人.english_translation: friend (formal, slightly more distant than 友)

収める.english_translation: to obtain, get (results); to store, put away

取り上げる.english_translation: to take up, adopt (a topic); to take away, confiscate

取れる.english_translation: to come off, be removed; to be obtained, be available

叩く.english_translation: to strike, hit, clap; to beat, tap

台.english_translation: stand, base; platform; counter for machines/vehicles
台.russian_translation: подставка, основание; счетное слово для техники

合わせる.english_translation: to match, fit, adjust; to combine

同時.english_translation: simultaneous, concurrent; at the same time

名.english_translation: name, reputation; given name (in full name); unit for people (archaic)
名.russian_translation: имя, название; счетное слово для людей

名人.english_translation: master, expert; celebrity (in a specific field)

吐く.english_translation: to breathe out, exhale; to vomit; to speak (a lie, harsh words)

向く.english_translation: to face, turn toward; to be suitable for

向ける.english_translation: to turn (something) toward, aim (at); to direct (attention)

味方.english_translation: friend, supporter, ally; being on one's side
味方.russian_translation: сторонник, союзник; быть на чьей-л. стороне

回す.english_translation: to turn, rotate; to send around

国語.english_translation: national language (Japanese); Japanese language (as a school subject)

基.english_translation: basis, foundation, standard; counter for machines/structures

基づく.english_translation: to be based on, to originate from

場面.english_translation: scene, setting (of a play, novel); situation

売れる.english_translation: to sell (well, easily); to be well known (passive form of 売る)

外す.english_translation: to unfasten, detach, remove; to miss (a target)

多少.english_translation: more or less, a little; quantity, amount

大した.english_translation: great, serious; (with negative) not important, nothing much

夫人.english_translation: wife, Mrs., madam (polite, especially referring to someone else's wife)

失う.english_translation: to lose (something intangible or a person), to miss (an opportunity)

奥.english_translation: interior, inner part; back (of a room)

奪う.english_translation: to snatch away, rob, take by force

姿.english_translation: figure, shape, appearance (especially of a person)

婦人.english_translation: woman, lady (polite, used for adult women)

学.english_translation: learning, study, science (often as a suffix or in compounds)

宅.english_translation: house, home (polite reference to someone else's); homebody (slang)

守る.english_translation: to protect, guard; to keep (a promise), observe (a rule)

宜しい.english_translation: good, fine, acceptable (polite form of いい)

実は.english_translation: in fact, actually, to tell the truth
実は.russian_translation: на самом деле, по правде говоря

対する.english_translation: to face, confront; toward, regarding, in contrast to
対する.russian_translation: относиться к, противостоять, по отношению к

少々.english_translation: a little, a few (time or amount); please wait a moment

少しも.english_translation: not at all, not the least (used with negative verb)

尤も.english_translation: reasonable, natural; (as a conjunction) though, although, granted that

就く.english_translation: to take (a seat, post), to settle into; to start (work)

局.english_translation: office, bureau; TV/radio station; game (counter for games like chess)

届く.english_translation: to reach, arrive; to be delivered

履く.english_translation: to put on (footwear, trousers, skirt, etc.)

州.english_translation: state, province (in the US, China, etc.); continent (archaic)

左右.english_translation: left and right; influence, control; about, approximately

年中.english_translation: all year round, throughout the year

引退.russian_translation: выход на пенсию, уход (из спорта, работы)

張る.english_translation: to stretch, tense; to spread; to paste

当たる.english_translation: to hit, strike (a target); to be right, guess correctly; to be assigned (a role)

当てる.english_translation: to hit (a target); to guess (correctly); to apply (e.g., a cloth)

当時.english_translation: at that time, in those days

彼等.english_translation: they (formal or literary, used to refer to a group of people)

後者.english_translation: the latter (the second of two mentioned)

得る.english_translation: to get, obtain, acquire; to be able to (as a suffix: 'possible to do')

得意.english_translation: one's strong point; triumph; client (of a merchant)

御.english_translation: honorable, respectful prefix (often written in hiragana as お or ご)

必死.russian_translation: отчаянный, смертельный; во что бы то ни стало

応じる.english_translation: to respond, answer, comply with; to agree to

恋.english_translation: love, romantic passion, falling in love

恩.english_translation: favor, blessing, kindness, debt of gratitude

悩む.english_translation: to worry, be troubled, suffer from (a problem)

感じ.english_translation: feeling, sense, impression; way of doing things

感動.english_translation: deep emotion, impression, being moved (by something)

成る.english_translation: to become, turn into; to consist of (intransitive)

成績.english_translation: results (e.g., of a test), grade, score

所為.english_translation: fault, responsibility; because of (often negative connotation)

手品.english_translation: magic trick, conjuring, sleight of hand

扱う.english_translation: to handle, deal with, manage; to treat

批評.english_translation: criticism, review, commentary (evaluation of strengths and weaknesses)

抜く.english_translation: to pull out, extract; to omit; to surpass

抜ける.english_translation: to come out, fall out; to be missing; to pass through

抱える.english_translation: to hold (in one's arms); to have (a problem/burden)

抱く.english_translation: to hold in one's arms, embrace; to harbor (a feeling/thought)

招く.english_translation: to invite; to cause (a bad result)

持ち上げる.english_translation: to lift, raise; to praise excessively (flatter)

指す.english_translation: to point (at), indicate; to name; to mean

振る.english_translation: to shake, wave (a hand, flag); to swing; to sprinkle (salt)

掛かる.english_translation: to hang (down); to take (time/money); to cost; to start (a machine)

掴む.english_translation: to grasp, seize, catch (literally or figuratively, e.g., opportunity)

描く.english_translation: to draw, paint, sketch; to describe, imagine

換える.english_translation: to exchange, change, replace (something for another)

放す.english_translation: to set free, release, let go

救う.english_translation: to save, rescue, help out of trouble

文句.english_translation: complaint; phrase, remark (often used to mean 'complaint')

断る.english_translation: to refuse, decline; to give notice, inform

明ける.english_translation: to dawn, become light; to end (a period of time)

是非.english_translation: right and wrong, pros and cons; by all means, definitely

暮れ.english_translation: sunset, end of the day; year-end

更に.russian_translation: более того, к тому же; снова, еще

最も.english_translation: most, extremely, to the greatest extent

最中.english_translation: in the middle of, during; at its peak

有る.english_translation: to be, exist (for inanimate objects); to have

望む.english_translation: to desire, wish for, hope; to look out on (a view)

末.english_translation: end (of a period/thing); close (of a family/group)

本人.english_translation: the person himself, the said person

来.english_translation: to come (often used as a prefix for next, e.g., 来月 next month)
